bank.title: BEAR Math Placement Exam Practice, Part 1 (Algebra)

outcome.title: Integer Arithmetic
outcome.description: Add, subtract, multiply, and divide integers up to two-digits, attending to negative signs.

outcome.title: Rational Number Arithmetic
outcome.description: Add, subtract, multiply, and divide rational numbers with denominators up to 36.

outcome.title: Linear Expressions and Equations
outcome.description: Simplify expressions and solve equations of linear type.

outcome.title: Linear Inequalities and Interval Notation
outcome.description: Solve linear inequalities, and use and understand interval notation.

outcome.title: Graphs and Forms of Linear Equations
outcome.description: Solve problems involving two-variable linear equations and their data points.

outcome.title: Exponent Properties
outcome.description: Simplify products and quotients of monomial expressions using exponent properties.

outcome.title: Expanding Polynomial Expressions
outcome.description: Simplify sums, differences, and products of polynomial expressions.

outcome.title: Factoring Polynomial Expressions
outcome.description: Factor polynomial expressions using greatest common factor and quadratic-trinomial methods.

outcome.title: Using Factored Forms
outcome.description: Use polynomials' factored forms to simplify rational expressions and solve polynomial equations.

outcome.title: Rational Expression Arithmetic
outcome.description: Simplify sums, differences, products, and quotients of rational expressions with at least one common factor in their denominators.

outcome.title: Square-Root and Radical Expressions
outcome.description: Simplify expressions involving radicals, especially square roots.

outcome.title: Quadratic Equations
outcome.description: Solve quadratic equations, including those that do not factor over the integers.
